metadata.title: CVE-2011-1298 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An Integer Overflow exists in WebKit in Google Chrome before Blink M11 inthe macOS WebCore::GraphicsContext::fillRect function.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
